title: marundonru tArum
sahitya:
marundonru tArum ayyA en manap-pEi iNangi nalla ninaippODunai tudikka


anupallavi

  varundum yuirkku jnAna virundAi-irundudavum


caraNam 1    nAvukkiniya divya nAmam tarum marundu nATTattirp-param jyOti kATTum tani marundu
sAvA amara nilai mEva varum marundu shaktik-kanal vaLarkkum saccidAnandamAna
    caraNam 2    cinmaya viLaiyATTAi jagattaik-kATTum marundu cintittavuDan aSTa siddhi tarum marundu
enmaya uyirgaLil tanmayam kATTiDum Eka sukha bhOgamAgum tiruvaruLin
